This document will serve to orient you to RStudio and Quarto for building dashboard-style websites.

# Install RStudio and Quarto

1.  Click [HERE](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/) to download RStudio for your computer. Install the program.
2.  Click [HERE](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/) to download and install Quarto.
